Create an array of movie objects. Each movie should have a title, rating, and hasWatched properties. Iterate through the array and print out something that looks like:

You have watched "The Departed" - 5 stars

You have not seen "Frozen" - 3 stars

You have seen "The Accountant" - 5 stars

You have not seen "The Lighthouse" - 4 stars

Please check console for results
